scroll-to-error.description: Whether to scroll to the failed form item when the validation fails, the optional value is start end
scroll-to-error.description_zh: Whether to scroll to the failed form item when the validation fails, the optional value is start end

scroll-to-error-offset-y.description: Scroll to the position offset of the form item that fails validation
scroll-to-error-offset-y.description_zh: Scroll to the position offset of the form item that fails validation

events.name: submit
events.description: Triggered when the form is submitted
events.description_zh: Triggered when the form is submitted
events.params: valid: boolean Whether to pass the form verification

events.name: reset
events.description: Fired when the form is reset
events.description_zh: Fired when the form is reset
